document_data.name: Maura
document_data.mainbody: '''Maura''' was a lieutenant of the [[Sisters of Synnoria]], warriors of the [[Llewyrr]].{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|3335}}
document_data.Relationships: As part of the Sisters of Synnoria, she fought under [[Brigit]]'s command and had [[Carina]] and [[Aileen]] as companions.
